displayAddress: Queens Court, Queen Street, Manchester, M2 5HX
detailedDescription: Rare Freehold Office Opportunity in Manchester City Centre ideal for Investors and Owner-Occupiers Recently refurbished and excellently positioned building benefitting from the successful redevelopment of Lincoln Square into a vibrant public open space with new Grade A offices at 125 Deansgate, The Lincoln and St. Michael’s Manchester has established itself as the economic and cultural capital of the north Good quality office accommodation across Ground to 4th floor with 6 demised car parking spaces Total floor area of 11,948 sq ft NIA Let to Manchester Credit Union Limited across the ground & 1st floor and Sellick Partnership Group Limited across the 2nd, 3rd and 4th. Manchester Credit Union are in occupation until 15/06/2028. Sellick Partnership Group are in occupation until 05/12/2025. Total topped up rental income of £228,575 per annum (c. £20.18 psf) Freehold In accordance with Anti-Money Laundering Regulations, two forms of identification and confirmation of the source of funding will be required from the successful purchaser.

displayAddress: Priestley Point, Wardley Industrial Estate, Manchester

displayAddress: 3B South Park Way, Wakefield 41 Business Park, Wakefield
detailedDescription: A substantial redevelopment opportunity comprising approximately 1 acre (0.4 hectares). The office building currently on the site is situated in a predominantly industrial area and therefore holds potential for a wide variety of opportunities and/or development of the wider site, subject to consents. The site is located within the established Wakefield 41 Business Park which benefits from easy access to Junction 41 of the M1 motorway. The property is approximately 1.5 miles to the north of Wakefield City Centre and 10 miles south of Leeds.

displayAddress: Stocks Industrial Estate, Legh Street, Eccles, M30 0UT
detailedDescription: Stocks Industrial Estate consists of a series of adjoining buildings of varying periods of constriction The buildings comprise a mixture of traditional brick built industrial units, and more latterly constructed steel portal frame units with blockwork infills and profile metal cladding thereto. Stocks Industrial Estate is located on Spencer Street, just off Liverpool Road in Eccles. Eccles is approximately 5 miles West of Manchester City Centre and benefits from easy access to the M 60 and M 62 motorway networks Eccles also benefits from close proximity to Trafford Park, Manchester’s primary industrial, storage and distribution district. Unit 4 – 7,457 sq.ft

displayAddress: 22 Sunderland Street, Macclesfield, SK11 6UH
detailedDescription: Location The subject property is prominently located on Sunderland Street, within Macclesfield town centre. The property is located on the western side of Sunderland Street, a short walk from the railway station and bus station. Description The subject property is Grade II listed and comprises a 2-storey detached property of brick construction beneath a pitched slate roof. Tenancy The property is currently held on 2 leases. The ground floor is let to private individuals who run a long-established snooker club on a 3-year lease expiring on 31st January 2027. The current rent is £15,500 per annum. The offices on the first floor are let to Imperium Law Solicitors Limited who currently hold the property on a continuation tenancy. The current rent is £10,000 per annum. Both leases can be brought to an end on 6 months’ notice. Offers in the region of £750,000.

displayAddress: 49 King Street, Manchester, M2 7AY

This property offers a selection of well presented boutique offices across 5 floors. The subject property is located in a thriving area of Manchester City Centre. The property is situated on the thriving retail hub of King Street, approximately 400 meters from the Metrolink stops and within a short walking distance to Piccadilly, Victoria and Deansgate mainline train stations. 1st Floor 840 sq.ft 3rd Floor 689 sq.ft 6th Floor 379 sq.ft

displayAddress: Bateman Court, Bateman Street, Derby, DE23 8JQ
detailedDescription: The property is arranged on ground and first floor to provide an office building with 30 car spaces on a site area of 0.20 hectares (0.5acres). All accommodation is refurbished to include new suspended ceilings with Category I Lighting and male and female WCs. Derby, with a population of some 233,000, is an important commercial and industrial centre located some 8 mile from Junctions 24 & 25 of the M1 motorway and 11 miles north west of Nottingham East Midlands Airport. The property is situated in a predominantly commercial location on a corner site at the junction with Bateman Street and London Road/ Osborne Street about half a mile south east of Derby City Centre. Suite B 1,537 sq.ft Suite G 2,917 sq.ft

displayAddress: Cooper House, Third Avenue, Trafford Park, M17 1JE
detailedDescription: Cooper House is a mixed use scheme comprising of retail accommodation to the ground floor and office accommodation to the upper floors. The available accommodation comprises 2nd floor office space above the retail parade on Third Avenue. The suites benefit from Male and Female toilets and a small kitchen area. The offices have recently been refurbished to a good specification complete with new carpets throughout. In addition, Cooper House benefits from a private car park for exclusive use by the tenants. Cooper House is located at the heart of Trafford Park on Third Avenue, The Village, just off Ashburton Road East. The property is 4 miles from Manchester City Centre, and 3 miles from the M60, which provides access to the North West and national Motorway networks. 380 Ground Floor (Retail) 633 sq.ft

displayAddress: Discovery House, Discovery Park, Stockport, SK4 5BH

A fantastic refurbishment has been carried out to the ground floor suite available. Discovery House occupies a prominent position at the entrance to Discovery Park, which in turn fronts Crossley Road, close to the A6 Wellington Road North. The property is located within 2 miles of Junction 1 of the M60 Orbital Motorway and approximately 7 miles from Manchester Airport. Part First Floor 350 sq.ft

displayAddress: Ropewalks, Newton Street, Macclesfield, SK11 6QJ
detailedDescription: With a characterful blend of old and new, brick, glass and wood finishes, this light, bright and bold building will prove a stimulating setting for any company. Ropewalks provides high quality office accommodation in the centre of Macclesfield, one of Cheshire’s most prosperous towns. Ropewalks is built around an attractive courtyard with its own car parking, suiting those companies looking for a distinctive base with style and elegance. Good coffee houses, restaurants and tempting shops are within a stone’s throw away along with the convenience of a well-established public transport system. Although Ropewalks has a contemporary design, the result of which is a building of individual character and style where practical matters have not been ignored. There are currently a variety of suites available, ranging from 368 sq.ft up to 5,049 sq.ft.

displayAddress: 71 Water Lane, Wilmslow, SK9 5BQ
detailedDescription: Attractive leisure investment in the heat of Wilmslow Town Centre. Fully let to Zumuku Editions Limited and The Thai Chefs Limited t/a Chilli Banana. The Property comprises a three storey end of terrace property of brick construction beneath a pitched slate roof. There is a roof terrace at first floor level which has the benefit of a retractable roof and a glazed elevation. The footprint of the building occupies the majority of the site with a small demised area to the side of the building for some parking and the storage of refuse bins etc. The accommodation is arranged over basement, ground and first floor levels with a gross internal floor area of 4,269 sq ft (397 m²). The restaurant is held on a 10 year, full repairing and insuring lease expiring on 25th November 2031. The current passing rent is £55,000 per annum and the rent rises on 25th November 2023 to £60,000 per annum. There is a also an RPI based rent review at the 5th anniversary. The take away is held on a full repairing and insuring lease, for a term of 4.5 years expiring on 23rd February 2027. The current passing rent is £15,000 per annum. There is a tenant only break clause at the 2nd anniversary, subject to specific conditions.

displayAddress: Speke Boulevard, Liverpool, L24 9HZ
detailedDescription: A prominent development site adjoining Dobbies Garden Centre. Approximately 1.5 acre site, sitting between Dobbies Garden Centre and Euro Garages. The site is located in an extremely prominent position fronting Speke Boulevard which has an average daily traffic count of approximately 40,000 vehicles. Speke Boulevard is the established out of town destination for the South Merseyside area. The site is currently cleared with access from Longman Drive, with potential for access via Dobbies car park. Please note that the final site area to be disposed is subject to legal confirmation as to the extent of the boundaries. >Planning Existing planning consent exists for hotel use. The site lends itself to other roadside uses such as leisure, drive-through’s and self-storage. >Basis of Sale The long leasehold interest of the site is available as a whole and prospective purchasers will need to provide the following: I) The purchasing entity including proposed use. II) Any conditions attached to any proposal. > Tenure The property is held on a ground lease for a term of 250 years from 24th May 2018.
